It was developed and is operated by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anschutz_Entertainment_Group\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Anschutz Entertainment Group\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (AEG) in partnership with Outbox Technologies. In September 2019, AEG bought out Outbox's partnership and AXS is now a wholly owned subsidiary of AEG\\r.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The initial AXS deployment was August 2011 and venues and services have been added in a phased roll out. As of August 2013, AXS was the exclusive or the primary ticket provider for over 30 US venues and 9 UK venues. The first \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Staples_Center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staples Center\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" concert available only through AXS was \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beyonc%C3%A9\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Beyonc√© \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"in 2013; both \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Los_Angeles_Lakers\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Los Angeles Lakers\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Los_Angeles_Clippers\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Los Angeles Clippers\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" are still using Ticketmaster. The \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White-label_product\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"white label technology\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Outbox developed enables AEG to sell tickets under either the AXS brand name or under local venue name brands, which have considerable services\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for either approach. AXS\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AXS aims to block large volume, automated purchases by computer programs used by ticket resalers by using a \\\"waiting room\\\" facility on a separate server. Users log their personal details and purchase information prior to tickets going on sale and are screened for multiple purchases. The server has passed stress testing by 1 million users, so the site should not crash\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AXS Invite\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AXS selectively offers an add-on feature, AXS Invite, which lets ticket purchasers reserve adjacent seats for friends, who have up to 48 hours to decide on receiving email or social media notification. Invite is not available when tickets are initially sold, is only available at some venues, and is unlikely to help at oversubscribed shows. AXS acknowledges that the feature is \\\"really about finding a way to sell more tickets\\\", while enhancing customer convenience.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
